content: Hello! Thank you for reaching out to XYZ Home Services. May I have your name, please?
Hi, this is Mike. Actually, I think I might have dialed the wrong number.
No worries, Mike! Just to confirm, you did not intend to contact XYZ Home Services for plumbing, electrical, or HVAC assistance, correct?
That's right, I need to call a different service. Sorry for the confusion.
Thanks for letting us know, Mike! We will mark your number as a wrong contact to avoid future confusion. Have a great day!
reason: Customer confirms misdial and no service needed
